name: Richie's Plank Experience
description: You're on a plank, 80 stories high. Knees shaky, palms sweaty. You have a choice. Do you walk or do you freeze? Richie's Plank is the only VR experience that lets you clone any real-world plank into the virtual world for 2X the immersion. Includes 4 bonus modes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 980 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2050 MB available space Sound Card: Windows Compatable
